reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Capacity building of Indian legislators to support their work to implement clean energy technologies and promote low carbon development at the local level.

description.narrative: To increase the take up of low carbon solutions by supporting legislators to deliver their plans at local level including through policy reforms and building their links with industry.

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
